name: USPS - United Space Parcel Service
description:
https://github.com/jeepitou/USPS

Credits:

  • Code & Game design: https://jeepitou.itch.io/
  • Art & Animation: https://www.instagram.com/chotothebright/
  • Music & Sound: https://www.instagram.com/miguiz_/

Controls:

  • WASD for movement
  • - M to view the map
  • - spacebar to get in ship
  • - spacebar to get out of ship
  • - spacebar to gather resources

Important information:

  • Resources are automatically given to the planets that require it when you land on the planet.
  • Map shows what kind of resource each planet require and produce.
  • You can carry a maximum of 50 of each resource.
  • Land with the back of the ship, otherwise, you will crash
  • Land softly, otherwise, you will crash
  • Keep an eye on your gaz level, and stop by the gaz planet to fill it up.
